text: ve inheritance - Avascular necrosis of the capital femoral epiphysis - Barrel-shaped chest - Beaking of vertebral bodies - Brachycephaly - Broad foot - Broad palm - Camptodactyly - Carpal bone hypoplasia - Coarse facial features - Cone-shaped epiphyses of the phalanges of the hand - Coxa vara - Deformed sella turcica - Disproportionate short-trunk short stature - Distal ulnar hypoplasia - Enlargement of the costochondral junction - Flat acetabular roof - Flat glenoid fossa - Genu valgum - Hallux
